long_description: Made with a large base for stability, the Planet Bike ALX Floor Pump features a smooth wood handle and a shiny aluminum barrel. AutoValve(TM) dual head fits both Presta and Schrader valves. Color-coded, 2-in. gauge is elevated to make it easier to read. Needle and cone adapters included for pumping up sport balls.
short_description: Made with a large base for stability, the Planet Bike ALX Floor Pump features a smooth wood handle and a shiny aluminum barrel.
